title: See "Agent/Agency" tab in Utilities Dashboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user that has any agent or agency permissions is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on "Utilities"
custom_expected:
THEN system should load the Utilities dashboard
AND An "Agent/Agency" tab should be available on the Utilities dashboard 
AND clicking on the Agent/Agency tab should load the tab and display the Agents and Agencies widgets

title: As a BOC user I want to view a directory of the agents in the system
custom_preconds: GIVEN the LRD wants to view a directory of agent profiles
custom_steps: WHEN the LRD locates the Agents Widget
custom_expected:
THEN the agent profiles should be reflected in the Agents Widget
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=dashboard

title: Filter Agents widget to only see Active Agents
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to filter search results in the agent widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the Active filter in the header
custom_expected: THEN only Active Agents will display in the widget

title: Filter Agents widget to only see Inactive Agents
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to filter search results in the agent widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the Inactive filter in the header
custom_expected: THEN only Inactive Agents will display in the widget

title: Filter Agents widget to see All Agents
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to filter search results in the agent widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the All filter in the header
custom_expected: THEN All agent profiles will display, Active and Inactive

title: Filter widget using Filter Icon
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has clicked on the Filter Icon in the Agents Widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user types in a criteria and clicks Apply
custom_expected: THEN only results that match the criteria will show

title: Open Agent profile from widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to open agent profile from the agent widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the agent hyperlink
custom_expected: THEN that agent profile opens

title: Close Agent profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to close an Agent's profile
AND is in view mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the close button in an Agent's profile
custom_expected:
THEN the Agent's profile will close
AND user will be returned to entry point

title: BOC creates new agent profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to create a new agent profile and has permissions
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to create new button on the agent widget
custom_expected: THEN a new agent profile will load in edit mode

title: New address should default to the US
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to add an address to an agents profile
AND is in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN clicks add address in an Agent's profile
custom_expected:
THEN form should default to USA
AND zipcode field should display (Same with Canada and US territories)

title: Add International address
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to add an international address to an agents profile
AND [C72682]
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a country other than US
custom_expected: THEN fields/dropdowns should display differently depending on which country

title: BOC saves new agent profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to save a new agent profile and has permission
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the save button
custom_expected:
THEN the system runs a rules check
AND the profile saves
AND the profile is visible in the agent widget

title: BOC adds Address to agent profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to add an address to an agent's profile and has permission
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is in edit mode and clicks the 'Add Address' button
AND there are multiple addresses saved
custom_expected:
THEN a new editable field will load with a trash icon
IF there is only one address there shouldn't be a trash icon

title: Indicate Agent's primary Address
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to specify an agent's primary address and there is more than one address
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 'Make Primary' and saves the profile
custom_expected: THEN that address should be shown with 'Primary' selected

title: BOC adds Phone number to agent profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to add a phone number to an agent's profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'add number'
custom_expected: THEN a new phone number field is populated

title: Indicate Agent's primary Phone Number
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user want's to specify an Agent's primary Phone Number
AND there are multiple phone numbers saved
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 'make primary' option
custom_expected: THEN that number will be noted as 'Primary'

title: BOC adds Email to agent profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to add an email to an Agent's profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'Add Email'
custom_expected: THEN a new set of editable fields populates

title: Indicate Agent's primary Email
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to specify an Agent's primary Email
AND there are multiple Emails entered
custom_steps: WHEN user selects 'Make Primary'
custom_expected: THEN that email is marked as 'Primary'

title: Verify list of players associated with Agent
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to verify a player is associated with an Agent
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects an Agent's profile and expands 'Represented Players'
custom_expected: THEN all players associated with that agent will be displayed

title: Receive Error if Required fields are not filled out
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has not filled out all required fields while creating a new agent profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks SAVE
custom_expected: THEN they will receive an error message of the required fields that need to be filled out

title: BOC marks agent active
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user wants to mark an agent as active
AND the user is in an Agent's profile
AND the user is in 'edit' mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user checks the box
AND clicks save
custom_expected: THEN the Agent will be saved as active

title: BOC marks agent inactive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user wants to mark an Agent as inactive
AND is in an Agent's profile
AND is in 'edit' mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user unchecks the box
AND clicks save
custom_expected: THEN the Agent's profile will be inactive

title: As a BOC user I want to see what errors there are to correct to be able to save an agent after I close the initial modal
custom_preconds:
Wiki:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89345064
GIVEN a BOC admin user is logged in 
AND user is attempting to save an agent profile
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN system should run a required field check and check for any formatting errors
AND if any required fields are not completed or poorly formatted, a blocking error message should be shown
AND after closing the errors modal  should show the error icon, containing the number of errors, pinned to the right side of the browser above the quick jump menu
AND errors that are tied to a field(required field error, invalid date error, etc.) should highlight that field with a 1px red (#d42307) border
AND clicking on the error icon should animate the errors container to reveal the errors (same animation and timing as quick jump)
AND errors should appear in an ordered list
AND a max-height should be set on the errors container and overflow should be shown with a scrollbar, as shown in the wireframe
AND clicking on the error icon when the error container is visible will close the container
AND if the user saves the profile successfully after correcting errors, remove the error icon(and white container)

title: Remove secondary Agent
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a player has a secondary Agent
AND that Agent has switched agencies
custom_steps:
WHEN the user lists a different agency under the agent
AND user clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN the Agent profile should load in view mode
AND secondary Agent should be removed from player's profile

title: Verify BOC can view directory of agencies
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to view the directory of agencies
custom_steps: WHEN the user scans their Agency widget
custom_expected: THEN all agencies should be listed

title: Verify historical agency profiles
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to view historical agency profiles
custom_steps: WHEN the user sorts through their Agency widget
custom_expected: THEN all agency profiles are reflected in the new system

title: Filter Agency widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to filter their Agency widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a filter
custom_expected: THEN only relevant matches are displayed

title: Open Agency profile from widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to open an Agency profile from their widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a hyperlink from the widget
custom_expected: THEN an Agency profile opens in view mode

title: BOC creates a new agency profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to create a new agency profile and has permission
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 'create new' from agency widget
custom_expected: THEN a new Agency profile will open in edit mode

title: BOC saves a new agency profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to save an agency profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the 'save' button in the Agency profile
custom_expected:
THEN the system runs a rules check and profile is saved
AND Profile appears in Agency widget

title: BOC adds Address to agency profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to add an address to an agency profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 'add address'
custom_expected: THEN a new set of editable fields populates

title: Indicate Agency's primary Address
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to specify an Agency's primary address
AND there are multiple addresses saved
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 'make primary'
custom_expected: THEN that address is listed first

title: BOC adds Phone Number to agency profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to add a phone number to agency profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 'add number' from agency profile
custom_expected: THEN a new set of editable fields populates

title: Indicate Agency's primary Phone Number
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to specify an Agency's primary Phone Number
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 'make primary' in the Agency's profile
custom_expected: THEN that phone number is listed first

title: Verify list of agents associated with Agency
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to view a list of agents associated with an Agency
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to an Agency's profile
custom_expected: THEN all active agents associated with the Agency profile are listed

title: Verify list of players associated with Agency
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to view a list of players associated with an Agency
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Agency's profile
custom_expected: THEN all players associated with that Agency will be listed

title: BOC sees errors to correct
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is unsure if the profile is complete
custom_steps:
WHEN a required field on an agency profile is missed
AND save is clicked
custom_expected: THEN an error message stating the missing fields or errors to the profile is shown

title: BOC marks agency active
custom_preconds: GIVEN the BOC opens an Agency profile
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks edit
AND clicks "Active" checkbox making it checked
AND user clicks save
AND logs in/out again
custom_expected: THEN the agency appears in any agency drop downs in the system

title: BOC marks agency inactive
custom_preconds: GIVEN the BOC opens an Active agency profile
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks edit
AND clicks the checkmark in the checkbox so it disappears
AND clicks save
AND logs in/out again
custom_expected: THEN will NOT show up in an Agency drop downs in the system

title: As a BOC user I want to see what errors there are to correct to be able to save an agency after I close the initial modal
custom_preconds:
Wiki:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89345053
GIVEN a BOC admin user is logged in
AND user is attempting to save an agency profile
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN system should run a required field check and check for any formatting errors
AND if any required fields are not completed or poorly formatted, a blocking error message should be shown 
AND after closing the errors modal system should show the error icon, containing the number of errors, pinned to the right side of the browser above the quick jump menu
AND errors that are tied to a field(required field error, invalid date error, etc.) should highlight that field with a 1px red (#d42307) border
AND clicking on the error icon should animate the errors container to reveal the errors (same animation and timing as quick jump)
AND errors should appear in an ordered list
AND a max-height should be set on the errors container and overflow should be shown with a scrollbar, as shown in the wireframe
AND clicking on the error icon when the error container is visible should close the container
AND if the user saves the profile successfully after correcting errors, remove the error icon(and white container)

title: As a BOC user I want updating an agent's associated agency to update the affected players' primary agents
custom_preconds:
Wiki:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89345053
GIVEN a BOC admin user is logged in
AND user is attempting to update an agent's profile
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" on the Agent profile
custom_expected:
THEN system should commit the changes to the Agent profile, and reload the agent profile in view mode
AND this agent should be removed as a representing agent for the affected players
AND the player will be updated to have "Agent not in system" in their player header

title: Club Admin review players that require update
custom_preconds: GIVEN an admin wants to review players that require an update
custom_steps:
WHEN a user logs in
AND opens the player/agent mapping roster
custom_expected: THEN those players that have their dropdowns enabled require update

title: Club admin review players that do NOT require update
custom_preconds: GIVEN an admin wants to review players the do NOT require an update
custom_steps:
WHEN the user logs in
AND clicks the Player/Agent mapping form in the Action Item widget
custom_expected: THEN those players who do not require an update will not be editable

title: Club Admin can add comments
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has completed [C70936]
AND wants to add comments
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks the comments bubble icon
custom_expected: THEN a text box should open and turn blue

title: Club Admin can complete mapping roster
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to complete their mapping roster
IF a player's agent/agency are not in the system
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'update'
custom_expected: THEN agent/agency dropdowns will enable with all of the agent/agencies in the system

title: Club Admin sees confirmation when roster submitted to LRD
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has completed the steps in [C70936]
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'submit'
custom_expected: THEN confirmation page will appear

title: BOC reviews player/agent mapping
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to review the player/agent mapping
AND has opened the player/agent mapping from the approvals widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks a player's name as a hyperlink
custom_expected: THEN a new window/tab open player's profile

title: BOC reject player/agent mapping
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to reject a player/agent mapping
AND has opened the player/agent mapping from the approval widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'reject' on a player's form
custom_expected:
THEN action item is created for submitting org
AND approval item is removed from approval widget
AND system displays reject notification
AND user is returned to approvals widget

title: BOC approve player/agent mapping to update and affect players' profiles
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has completed steps in [C70940]
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects anything other than 'new agent/agency' and 'confirm existing'
custom_expected: THEN their profile will be updated with any info from the form

title: Club Admin resubmit mapping roster to LRD
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has completed the steps in [C70938]
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks close and returns to action items
custom_expected:
THEN BOC will receive approval item for roster submission
AND action item will be removed from user's widget

title: BOC clicks agent name hyperlink
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has completed [C76341]
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the hyperlink for the agent's name
custom_expected: THEN the agent's profile is opened in a new tab or window

title: As a Club MJC Admin user I want to view the current agent and agency information for each player to appear on my Player/Agent Mapping Roster form
custom_preconds:
Wiki:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89345064
GIVEN a club MJC admin user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the Player/Agent Mapping roster item in the Club's Action Items widget
custom_expected:
THEN system should open the Player/Agent Mapping form
AND there should be a set of dropdown fields for each player, one for agent and one for agency
AND these dropdowns should be pre-populated with the current agent and agency information from the player profile for each player

title: Agent Club Roster action item permissions
custom_preconds:
Roles and Permissions: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Roles+and+Permissions
GIVEN a permission exists for Agent Club Roster Action Item
custom_steps: WHEN user is given this permission
custom_expected:
THEN by default this ability should be given to the Club - Contracts - Admin role group
BUT users without the permission cannot receive action items for this or view the associated form anywhere in the system
AND approving or rejecting a Club's Player/Agent Roster mapping is a permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed
BUT users without the permission cannot receive approvals items for this or view the submissions anywhere in the system.
AND by default this ability is given to the LRD - Contracts - Admin role group.

title: As a BOC MJC Admin I want to view results from approving a Club's Player/Agent Mapping
custom_preconds:
Wiki:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89345064
GIVEN a BOC MJC admin user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the Player/Agent Mapping roster item in the Approvals widget
custom_expected:
THEN system should open the Player/Agent Mapping form submitted by the Club
AND approve and Reject should be buttons on the form
AND clicking Approve should approve the form and remove the Approvals item from the Approvals widget
AND after all relevant updates have been made by the system, a modal should display as follows:
**Title:** "Confirmation"
**Body:** "The following have been approved:
                      * X  Agent/Agency confirmations
                      * Y Primary Agent updates
                      * Z Agent and Agency updates
                      * V new Agents and/or Agencies
                         (These player's Agent and/or Agency must be updated manually via their player profile) "
[X to be replaced with the number of players from the roster that the Club chose "Confirm Existing" for, Y to be replaced with the number of players from the roster the Club chose a new Agent for, but the Agency remained unchanged, Z to be replaced with the number of players from the roster that had their primary Agent and Agency updated, V to be replaced with the number of players from the roster that the Club chose either New Agency or New Agent]
**Button(s):** Close
AND clicking Close should close the modal and the Roster form and return the user to their Approvals

title: As a Club MJC Admin user I want to receive a notification when my player/agent roster form has been approved
custom_preconds:
See MJC Clipboard Requirements: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/MJC+-+Clipboard
GIVEN a Club MJC Admin user is logged in
AND club user has submitted a player agent roster form to BOC for approval
custom_steps: WHEN the roster form is approved by LRD/BOC
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate a Notification for the submitting Org
BUT unlike most notifications, this notification should not link to anything

title: Close Agency profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to close an Agencies profile
AND is in view mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the close button in an agency profile
custom_expected:
THEN the agencies profile will close
AND user is returned to the point of entry

title: Spreadsheet upload
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the LRD wants to upload a Player/Agent spreadsheet
AND the user selects the "Import Spreadsheet" button from the Agent widget
custom_steps:
WHEN the file browser opens accepting only correct file types
AND the user selects a file (see attached example)
AND the spreadsheet has no errors
custom_expected:
THEN a loading indicator appears
AND system runs a rules check
AND window closes

title: Receive confirmation results
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to see the number of Agent/Agencies updated and those that still need action
custom_steps:
WHEN a user imports a valid spreadsheet without any errors
AND there are entries that need to be updated
custom_expected: THEN they receive a 'results' message showing which uploads were successful and which need further action

title: Invalid file type
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to be notified if they upload an invalid file type
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to upload an invalid file
custom_expected: THEN the system only allows user to select valid filetypes

title: Error notifications in Agent/Agency speadsheet upload
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to be notified of any errors in the upload spreadsheet (required fields, valid format)
custom_steps: WHEN a user uploads a spreadsheet with errors
custom_expected:
THEN system does not upload the file
AND notifies user of the errors

title: Receive confirmation
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to see the number of Agent/Agencies updated
custom_steps: WHEN a user imports a valid spreadsheet without any errors
custom_expected: THEN they receive a blue 'confirmation' message showing which uploads were successful

title: Update Agent contact info
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants the mapping spreadsheet to update Agents' contact info
AND has uploaded a valid spreadsheet without any errors
custom_steps:
WHEN the system runs a rules check
AND processes spreadsheet row by row
custom_expected: THEN Agent's contact info in profile will be updated with what was contained in the spreadsheet

title: Update Agent's info (duplicate entry)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to use a mapping spreadsheet to update an Agent's contact info
AND has imported a spreadsheet with duplicate entries
custom_steps:
WHEN the system runs its rules check
AND processes each row in the spreadsheet
IF there are duplicate entries for the same agent
custom_expected:
THEN first entry will be recognized and not anything after
AND Agent's profile info will be updated with spreadsheet's first entry

title: Update Agent's info (mismatching Agency)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to use a mapping spreadsheet to update Agent's info
AND has imported a spreadsheet with a different Agency then on the Agent's profile
custom_steps:
WHEN the system runs a rules check
AND processes each row
IF there is an agent ID with a different Agency than that listed in their profile
custom_expected: THEN that agent will NOT be updated

title: Update Agent's info (wrong name)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to use a mapping spreadsheet to update an Agent's info
AND the spreadsheet contains a different name associated with the ID
custom_steps:
WHEN the system runs a rules check
AND processes each row
IF there is a different name for an Agent's ID
custom_expected:
THEN the system will default to the name already used in the system
AND Agent's info will be updated

title: BOC Create new profile corresponding to spreadsheet (Agency)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to create a new Agency profile for Agencies in an uploaded spreadsheet but are not already in system
AND has a uploaded a valid spreadsheet
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects create new from the dropdowns of unmapped Agencies
AND fills out required fields as if they were in the Agency widget
AND clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN The newly created agency profile will be shown in all agency dropdowns on the page WITHOUT the page losing any of the data entered by the user up until this point (cannot completely refresh the page)
AND the row from which the lightbox was initiated will have the value prepopulated when the user is returned to the screen.

title: BOC Create new profile corresponding to spreadsheet (Agent)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants an Agent's profile to be automatically created from the spreadsheet upload
AND has uploaded a valid spreadsheet with new agents
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects 'new agent' from the dropdown
AND clicks 'next'
custom_expected:
THEN The agent's information should match what was in the spreadsheet
AND The agent's UID should match the UID found in the spreadsheet
AND The agent should be Active and appear in the Agents widget and any relevant Agent dropdowns

title: BOC Reviews updated Agents
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has completed [C72692]
AND wants to review the Agents who will be updated as a result of the upload
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'Next'
custom_expected: THEN Agents will load as a hyperlink w/dropdowns

title: No Mappings to Confirm
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has completed [C72692]
AND wants to go directly to Step 2
AND has no mappings to confirm
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'Next'
custom_expected: THEN user is taken directly to Step 2

title: Confirm or Reject mappings
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has completed a spreadsheet upload
AND wants to either confirm or reject an Agent's Agency info
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects confirm or reject for each row
AND clicks 'Next'
custom_expected:
THEN confirmed Agents' info changes
AND rejected Agents' info stays the same

title: Agent's info updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has completed a spreadsheet upload
AND has updated contact info for an Agent
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects confirm from the dropdown
AND clicks 'Next'
custom_expected: THEN Agent's mapping and contact info updates in the system

title: Submit confirmation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has successfully uploaded a spreadsheet
AND it contains NO errors
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'submit'
custom_expected:
THEN user is returned to point of entry
AND blue confirmation message with text "Updated agent to agency mappings have been saved successfully" displays

title: Importing Agent Spreadsheet with Permissions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to import a spreadsheet
AND has permissions
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the agent widget
custom_expected:
THEN 'Import Spreadsheet' button should be visible
AND user should be able to view and edit agent information

title: As a BOC user I want to view a list of agencies in the spreadsheet the system was unable to map to the corresponding profiles in the system (Step 1)
custom_preconds:
Wiki:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89345064
Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=confirm_mapping_-_step_1

GIVEN a BOC admin user is logged in 
AND a user has uploaded a valid file that has passed all required checks
AND the BOC user has permission to perform this import
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Continue" after the spreadsheet confirmation message
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be taken to a form to complete the confirmation process
AND the form will display a table of Agencies that require further attention (ID in spreadsheet did not map to an existing profile)
AND form should match the wireframe (Agents should already exist)
AND clicking "Next" should save the form and take the user to the next step

title: As a BOC user I want a player's agent to update after a change to an agent's affiliation during spreadsheet upload
custom_preconds:
Wiki:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89345064
GIVEN a BOC admin user is logged in
AND user has uploaded a valid file that has passed all required checks
AND the user has permission to perform this import
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" on Step 2
custom_expected:
THEN system should commit the following changes to player profiles: 
* Any player that will be impacted by one of the agents changing agencies that does NOT have the agent listed as their primary agent, should have the agent removed as one of their representing agents
*  Any player that will be impacted by one of the agents changing agencies that does have the agent listed as their primary agent, should have their primary agent updated on their player profile, and their current agent should be removed. 
AND the player's new primary agent should be the first active (alphabetically) agent associated with the player's agency
AND in the event that the agency has no more active agents, the player's agent will be updated to day "Agent Not in System"

title: Confirm corresponding profiles (Agent)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to confirm the mapping of Agent ID's w/corresponding Agent profiles
custom_steps: WHEN the user imports a valid spreadsheet
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a dropdown with all active Agents listed alphabetically
AND an "exclude from export" option (default)
AND a 'New Agent' option

title: List agents that were unable to be mapped
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to view the Agents that were unable to be mapped in the spreadsheet upload
custom_steps:
WHEN the user imports a spreadsheet
AND has Agents that were unable to be mapped (duplicates, errors, formatting)
AND clicks continue in the confirmation message
custom_expected: THEN the user receives a list of agents the need further attention

title: BOC Agent UID
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to see the Agent's UID from spreadsheet import and NOT the ebis ID
custom_steps:
WHEN the user completes a spreadsheet upload
AND clicks Agent ID in an Agent profile
custom_expected:
THEN the Agent UID matches the spreadsheet import
AND the field is editable and only accepts numeric values

title: Existing Agent profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants the system to remember a newly imported Agent ID for an Agent that already exists
custom_steps:
WHEN the user uploads a spreadsheet
AND has a new agent ID
AND selects an already existing agent
custom_expected:
THEN the system overwrites exist Agent ID
AND remembers ID for future imports

title: BOC Agency ID
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to see the agency ID from spreadsheet import and NOT ebis1
custom_steps:
WHEN the user completes a spreadsheet upload
AND clicks Agency ID in an Agency profile
custom_expected:
THEN the agency ID matches that in the spreadsheet
AND the field is editable and only accepts numeric values

title: Confirm corresponding profiles (Agency)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to confirm the mapping of Agency ID's w/corresponding profiles
custom_steps: WHEN the user imports a spreadsheet
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a dropdown with Agencies listed alphabetically
AND "exclude from export" option (default)
AND 'New Agency' option

title: Existing Agency profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants the system to remember a newly imported Agency ID for an Agency that already exists
custom_steps:
WHEN the user uploads a spreadsheet
AND has a new agency ID
AND selects an already existing agency
custom_expected:
THEN the system overwrites exist Agency ID
AND remembers for future imports

title: Track updates made to a player's agent and agency information on their profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with with permission to edit player profiles
custom_steps: WHEN a user makes updates to a player's agent or agency information on their profile
custom_expected:
THEN the system should maintain a log of the change, as well as the previous values 
AND the tracking should include any updates made to a player's agent or agency info by the system 
AND IT should be able to generate a consumable list of agents and agencies that represented a player along with the times they represented the player if it is requested

title: Track updates made to a player's agent and agency information via spreadsheet upload

custom_steps: WHEN a user makes updates to a player's agent or agency information on their profile via spreadsheet upload
custom_expected:
THEN the system should maintain a log of the change, as well as the previous values 
AND the tracking should include any updates made to a player's agent or agency info by the system

title: Agent/Agency tab permissions- BOC
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is a MJC BOC account
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Agent/Agency Tab
custom_expected: THEN they will be able to view the tab

title: Agent/Agency tab permissions- Club
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is a MJC Club account
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Utilities dashboard
custom_expected: THEN they will NOT be able to edit the Agent/Agency tab

title: Agent/Agency tab permissions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in 
AND user does NOT have perms for either the Agent or Agency widget
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to access the Agent/Agency tab of an MJC
custom_expected: THEN user should NOT be able to access either widget
